document_data.name: Gargantua
document_data.mainbody: '''Gargantua''' ({{SingPl}}) were gigantic creatures native to [[Kara-Tur]]. They were among the largest creatures found on [[Toril]].

Varieties.[[Humanoid gargantua]]: Humanoid gargantua were the least intelligent of the gargantua and were similar, but larger, than the [[giant]]s found in [[Faer√ªn]], taller than even [[titan]]s.
Varieties.[[Insectoid gargantua]]: Insectoid gargantua looked like massive moths and were capable of flight.
Varieties.[[Reptilian gargantua]]: Reptilian gargantua were immense and likely the most massive of all creatures on Toril. They were the most commonly encountered type of gargantua.
